name: Science and Social Justice I
description: Exploring key themes and different kinds of knowledge implied by the notion of “learning without borders”, this interdisciplinary course looks at how scientific knowledge and technology are mobilized to deal with global problems such as disease, mental health, discrimination, economic inequality and threats to our environment.
exclusions: INI, SMC, TRI, UC, VIC, WDW One, Munk One; NEW101H1/NEW102H1/NEW103H1/NEW104H1/NEW105H1
